dimension:
4 x 4 x 11 1/4 in. (10.16 x 10.16 x 28.58 cm) (a: right moccasin)
3 1/4 x 3 1/2 x 11 1/2 in. (8.26 x 8.89 x 29.21 cm) (b: left moccasin)
title: Moccasins
description: beaded uppers; primarily pink, with white triangle design with green and red interior, surrounded by green designs on top; white and green designs along edges; rawhide bottoms, around foot opening, tongues, ties, and tassels at back
creditline: The Driscoll Art Accessions Endowment Fund
